title: LOOT HELP
body: I recently purchased loot boxes and keys and when I chose the option to open multiple the queue popped and I ended up just going into game. When I checked my loot to see if anything was added there was nothing. No skins or champion shards and my box and keys were gone. I checked my shop history and nothing shows up there as well. There's no way it could have ALL been blue essence in those boxes (mind you there were like 4-5 blue dots before queue popped). Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
It looks like you did open a good amount of chests, you even got more chests from some of them. Since it's so much content, I want to make sure you have a good list of everything you've gotten recently, so please shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get you that list. 

If you want even, mention this post and I'll help make sure you get the info you needed ^_^!
